anchors.text: Nyx — Primordial Veilborn, recently arrived in Noëlictus.
Does not yet understand Noëlictus politics; unfamiliar with local guild structures.
Recently tested; accepted provisionally by the hunters but viewed with suspicion.
Knows only rumors of Symphasia; has not met Erin Solstice in this timeline.
Feels unsettled but is actively trying to help despite fear of rejection.
